name: Final Zubagon Punch
effect: [Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +3000 DP until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, if that Digimon has 16000 DP or more, that Digimon gains ＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead), ＜Reboot＞ (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase), and ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) until the end of your opponent's next turn.
security_effect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.
